A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: If the Canto Blight story is there to show that heros can fail\, then really show them fail and then use that. But they don't learn from it\, they just go over to another clunky sequence with characters without personality. Add to this shoehorned attempts of humor\, where it is supposed to be funny that Hux gets bullied into submission by Kylo. That is just bullying.
